amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $2 million earmark for the Fort Mason Center Pier 2 Project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part C of House Report 111-209 to strike $2 million in funding for the `Fort Mason Center Pier 2 Project' and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 125 - 301 (Roll no. 585).
